Text.Name: Modifier_Magic_XuanWuHeart
Text.Desc: There will be no need for food, water or sleep for 3 days, but movement will become slow.

Text.Name: Modifier_XuanWuShield
Text.Desc: Drastically increases the Qi barrier and secret body endurance in a short span of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_XuanWuBreak
Text.Desc: Significantly decreases Qi Barrier and secret body endurance in a short span of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_JinFish
Text.Desc: Increases Qi Barrier and secret body endurance in a short span of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_LongTou1
Text.Desc: Slightly improves Mental State after praying sincerely and making a wish in the annual Dragon Incense Offering event.

Text.Name: Modifier_LongTou2
Text.Desc: Greatly increases the chance of Breakthrough after praying sincerely and making a wish in the annual Dragon Incense Offering event.

Text.Name: Modifier_LongTou3
Text.Desc: Slightly increases Defense after praying sincerely and making a wish in the annual Dragon Incense Offering event.

Text.Name: Modifier_LongTou5
Text.Desc: Despite the many blessings, receives a divine punishment and significantly decreases the Five Attributes after making too many wishes in the annual Dragon Incense Offering event.
